verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> happened יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> And it came to pass [after] many וּדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> that the word יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H452><s%> came to Elijah בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֖ית <S%H7992><s%> in the third לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֵ֚ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go הֵרָאֵ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> shew אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> thyself unto Ahab וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> and I will send מָטָ֖ר <S%H4306><s%> rain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> the earth

וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went אֵֽלִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah לְהֵרָא֖וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to shew אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> himself unto Ahab וְהָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> famine חָזָ֥ק <S%H2389><s%> And [there was] a sore בְּשֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> in Samaria

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> And Ahab אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֹבַדְיָ֖הוּ <S%H5662><s%> Obadiah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> which [was] the governor of [his] house וְעֹבַדְיָ֗הוּ <S%H5662><s%> (Now Obadiah הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become יָרֵ֛א <S%H3373><s%> feared אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> greatly

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּהַכְרִ֣ית <S%H3772><s%> cut off אִיזֶ֔בֶל <S%H348><s%> For it was [so] when Jezebel אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> נְבִיאֵ֣י <S%H5030><s%> the prophets יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took עֹבַדְיָ֜הוּ <S%H5662><s%> that Obadiah מֵאָ֣ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred נְבִאִ֗ים <S%H5030><s%> prophets וַֽיַּחְבִּיאֵ֞ם <S%H2244><s%> and hid חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> fifties אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> a בַּמְּעָרָ֔ה <S%H4631><s%> in a cave וְכִלְכְּלָ֖ם <S%H3557><s%> and fed לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> them with bread וָמָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> waste

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> And Ahab אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֹ֣בַדְיָ֔הוּ <S%H5662><s%> unto Obadiah לֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> into the land אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעְיְנֵ֣י <S%H4599><s%> unto all fountains הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וְאֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנְּחָלִ֑ים <S%H5158><s%> and unto all brooks אוּלַ֣י ׀ <S%H194><s%> peradventure נִמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> we may find חָצִ֗יר <S%H2682><s%> grass וּנְחַיֶּה֙ <S%H2421><s%> to save ס֣וּס <S%H5483><s%> the horses וָפֶ֔רֶד <S%H6505><s%> and mules וְל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> have to נַכְרִ֖ית <S%H3772><s%> that we lose מֵהַבְּהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> not all the beasts

וַֽיְחַלְּק֥וּ <S%H2505><s%> So they divided לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> like אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land לַֽעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> between them to pass throughout בָּ֑הּ אַחְאָ֞ב <S%H256><s%> it Ahab הָלַ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went בְּדֶ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> one לְבַדּ֔וֹ <S%H905><s%> himself וְעֹֽבַדְיָ֛הוּ <S%H5662><s%> by himself and Obadiah הָלַ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went בְּדֶרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> way אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> another לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H905><s%> himself

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become עֹבַדְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5662><s%> And as Obadiah בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> was in the way וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אֵלִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H452><s%> behold Elijah לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <S%H7125><s%> met וַיַּכִּרֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5234><s%> him and he knew וַיִּפֹּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> him and fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> on his face וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הַאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> is this אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> [Art] thou that my lord אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H452><s%> Elijah

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he answered ל֖וֹ אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> is לֵ֛ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go אֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> tell לַאדֹנֶ֖יךָ <S%H113><s%> thy lord הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H452><s%> Behold Elijah

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מֶ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What חָטָ֑אתִי <S%H2398><s%> What have I sinned כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> you נֹתֵ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> that thou wouldest deliver אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדְּךָ֛ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אַחְאָ֖ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab לַהֲמִיתֵֽנִי׃ <S%H4191><s%> to slay

חַ֣י ׀ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אִם־ <S%H518><s%> is no יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> there is no גּ֤וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation וּמַמְלָכָה֙ <S%H4467><s%> or kingdom אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> whither לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not שָׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> hath not sent אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> my lord שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> in it לְבַקֶּשְׁךָ֔ <S%H1245><s%> to seek וְאָמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> thee and when they said אָ֑יִן <S%H369><s%> else וְהִשְׁבִּ֤יעַ <S%H7650><s%> [He is] not [there] he took an oath אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּמְלָכָה֙ <S%H4467><s%> of the kingdom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגּ֔וֹי <S%H1471><s%> and nation כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִמְצָאֶֽכָּה׃ <S%H4672><s%> that they found

וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> and now אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you אֹמֵ֑ר <S%H559><s%> And now thou sayest לֵ֛ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go אֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> tell לַאדֹנֶ֖יךָ <S%H113><s%> thy lord הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H452><s%> Behold Elijah

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> will come אֲנִ֣י ׀ <S%H589><s%> I אֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> along מֵאִתָּ֗ךְ <S%H853><s%> וְר֨וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> from thee that the Spirit יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יִֽשָּׂאֲךָ֙ <S%H5375><s%> shall carry עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> and לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot אֵדָ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> thee whither I know וּבָ֨אתִי <S%H935><s%> not and [so] when I come לְהַגִּ֧יד <S%H5046><s%> and tell לְאַחְאָ֛ב <S%H256><s%> Ahab וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יִֽמְצָאֲךָ֖ <S%H4672><s%> and he cannot find וַהֲרָגָ֑נִי <S%H2026><s%> thee he shall slay וְעַבְדְּךָ֛ <S%H5650><s%> me but I thy servant יָרֵ֥א <S%H3372><s%> fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִנְּעֻרָֽי׃ <S%H5271><s%> from my youth

הֲלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֻגַּ֤ד <S%H5046><s%> Was it not told לַֽאדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> my lord אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> what I did בַּהֲרֹ֣ג <S%H2026><s%> slew אִיזֶ֔בֶל <S%H348><s%> when Jezebel אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> נְבִיאֵ֣י <S%H5030><s%> the prophets יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וָאַחְבִּא֩ <S%H2244><s%> how I hid מִנְּבִיאֵ֨י <S%H5030><s%> prophets יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S מֵ֣אָה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men חֲמִשִּׁ֨ים <S%H2572><s%> by fifty חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> fifties אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> a בַּמְּעָרָ֔ה <S%H4631><s%> in a cave וָאֲכַלְכְּלֵ֖ם <S%H3557><s%> and fed לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> them with bread וָמָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> waste

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> and now אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you אֹמֵ֔ר <S%H559><s%> And now thou sayest לֵ֛ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go אֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> tell לַֽאדֹנֶ֖יךָ <S%H113><s%> thy lord הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H452><s%> Behold Elijah וַהֲרָגָֽנִי׃ <S%H2026><s%> [is here] and he shall slay ס

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said אֵֽלִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah חַ֚י <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom עָמַ֖דְתִּי <S%H5975><s%> whom I stand לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> before כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> will surely הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> myself unto him to day אֵרָאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> I will surely shew אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went עֹבַדְיָ֛הוּ <S%H5662><s%> So Obadiah לִקְרַ֥את <S%H7125><s%> to meet אַחְאָ֖ב <S%H256><s%> Ahab וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> and told ל֑וֹ וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אַחְאָ֖ב <S%H256><s%> him and Ahab לִקְרַ֥את <S%H7125><s%> to meet אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H452><s%> Elijah

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> saw אַחְאָ֖ב <S%H256><s%> And it came to pass when Ahab אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H452><s%> Elijah וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> that Ahab אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about הַאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> to him זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> is this עֹכֵ֥ר <S%H5916><s%> unto him [Art] thou he that troubleth יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he answered לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have not עָכַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H5916><s%> I have not troubled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you וּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> but thou and thy father's בַּֽעֲזָבְכֶם֙ <S%H5800><s%> in that ye have forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוֹ֣ת <S%H4687><s%> the commandments יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after that הַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <S%H1168><s%> Baalim

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now therefore שְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> Now therefore send קְבֹ֥ץ <S%H6908><s%> [and] gather אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> to me all Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> unto mount הַכַּרְמֶ֑ל <S%H3760><s%> Carmel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְבִיאֵ֨י <S%H5030><s%> and the prophets הַבַּ֜עַל <S%H1168><s%> of Baal אַרְבַּ֧ע <S%H702><s%> four מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֗ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty וּנְבִיאֵ֤י <S%H5030><s%> and the prophets הָֽאֲשֵׁרָה֙ <S%H842><s%> of the groves אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> four מֵא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֹכְלֵ֖י <S%H398><s%> which eat שֻׁלְחַ֥ן <S%H7979><s%> table אִיזָֽבֶל׃ <S%H348><s%> at Jezebel's

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אַחְאָ֖ב <S%H256><s%> So Ahab בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּקְבֹּ֥ץ <S%H6908><s%> together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> the prophets אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> unto mount הַכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <S%H3760><s%> Carmel

וַיִּגַּ֨שׁ <S%H5066><s%> came אֵלִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֞י <S%H4970><s%> How אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you פֹּסְחִים֮ <S%H6452><s%> halt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> How long שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> ye between two הַסְּעִפִּים֒ <S%H5587><s%> opinion אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> [be] God לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> but וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הַבַּ֖עַל <S%H1168><s%> follow him but if Baal לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרָ֑יו <S%H310><s%> after that וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not עָנ֥וּ <S%H6030><s%> answered הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> him And the people אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> him not a word

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H452><s%> Elijah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people אֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I נוֹתַ֧רְתִּי <S%H3498><s%> I [even] I only remain נָבִ֛יא <S%H5030><s%> a prophet לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְבַדִּ֑י <S%H905><s%> alone וּנְבִיאֵ֣י <S%H5030><s%> prophets הַבַּ֔עַל <S%H1168><s%> but Baal's אַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> [are] four מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וְיִתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> Let them therefore give לָ֜נוּ שְׁנַ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> us two פָּרִ֗ים <S%H6499><s%> bullocks וְיִבְחֲר֣וּ <S%H977><s%> and let them choose לָהֶם֩ <S%H1992><s%> like הַפָּ֨ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock הָאֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> one וִֽינַתְּחֻ֗הוּ <S%H5408><s%> for themselves and cut it in pieces וְיָשִׂ֙ימוּ֙ <S%H7760><s%> and lay עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָ֣עֵצִ֔ים <S%H6086><s%> [it] on wood וְאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> no fire לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יָשִׂ֑ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> and put וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה ׀ <S%H6213><s%> [under] and I will dress אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock הָאֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> the other וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> and lay עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָ֣עֵצִ֔ים <S%H6086><s%> [it] on wood וְאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> no fire לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no אָשִֽׂים׃ <S%H7760><s%> and put

וּקְרָאתֶ֞ם <S%H7121><s%> And call בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> ye on the name אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H430><s%> of your gods וַֽאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> and I אֶקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> and I will call בְשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> on the name יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְהָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> and the God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יַעֲנֶ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> that answereth בָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> by fire ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> let him be God וַיַּ֧עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> and said ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> It is well הַדָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> spoken

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah לִנְבִיאֵ֣י <S%H5030><s%> unto the prophets הַבַּ֗עַל <S%H1168><s%> of Baal בַּחֲר֨וּ <S%H977><s%> Choose לָכֶ֜ם הַפָּ֤ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock הָֽאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> you one וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> for yourselves and dress רִאשֹׁנָ֔ה <S%H7223><s%> [it] first כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you הָרַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> for ye [are] many וְקִרְאוּ֙ <S%H7121><s%> and call בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> on the name אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> of your gods וְאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> no fire לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no תָשִֽׂימוּ׃ <S%H7760><s%> but put

וַ֠יִּקְחוּ <S%H3947><s%> And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֨ר <S%H6499><s%> the bullock אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> which was given לָהֶם֮ וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֒ <S%H6213><s%> them and they dressed וַיִּקְרְא֣וּ <S%H7121><s%> [it] and called בְשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> on the name הַ֠בַּעַל <S%H1168><s%> of Baal מֵהַבֹּ֨קֶר <S%H1242><s%> from morning וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַצָּהֳרַ֤יִם <S%H6672><s%> even until noon לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> saying הַבַּ֣עַל <S%H1168><s%> O Baal עֲנֵ֔נוּ <S%H6030><s%> hear וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> us But [there was] no ק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> was no עֹנֶ֑ה <S%H6030><s%> nor any that answered וַֽיְפַסְּח֔וּ <S%H6452><s%> And they leaped עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> which was made

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> came בַֽצָּהֳרַ֜יִם <S%H6672><s%> And it came to pass at noon וַיְהַתֵּ֧ל <S%H2048><s%> mocked בָּהֶ֣ם אֵלִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H452><s%> that Elijah וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> them and said קִרְא֤וּ <S%H7121><s%> Cry בְקוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> A loud כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> either אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> for he [is] a god ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> either שִׂ֧יחַ <S%H7879><s%> either he is talking וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> either שִׂ֛יג <S%H7873><s%> or he is pursuing ל֖וֹ וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> either דֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> or he is in a journey ל֑וֹ אוּלַ֛י <S%H194><s%> [or] peradventure יָשֵׁ֥ן <S%H3463><s%> he sleepeth ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> and needs וְיִקָֽץ׃ <S%H3364><s%> and must be awaked

וַֽיִּקְרְאוּ֙ <S%H7121><s%> And they cried בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> A loud וַיִּתְגֹּֽדְדוּ֙ <S%H1413><s%> and cut כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֔ם <S%H4941><s%> themselves after their manner בַּחֲרָב֖וֹת <S%H2719><s%> with knives וּבָֽרְמָחִ֑ים <S%H7420><s%> and lancets עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until שְׁפָךְ־ <S%H8210><s%> gushed out דָּ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> till the blood עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כַּעֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> was past הַֽצָּהֳרַ֔יִם <S%H6672><s%> And it came to pass when midday וַיִּֽתְנַבְּא֔וּ <S%H5012><s%> and they prophesied עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until לַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> until the [time] of the offering הַמִּנְחָ֑ה <S%H4503><s%> of the [evening] sacrifice וְאֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> there ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> that [there was] neither voice וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> was no עֹנֶ֖ה <S%H6030><s%> nor any to answer וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no קָֽשֶׁב׃ <S%H7182><s%> nor any that regarded

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלִיָּ֤הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people גְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H5066><s%> Come near אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about וַיִּגְּשׁ֥וּ <S%H5066><s%> came near כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> unto me And all the people אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to him וַיְרַפֵּ֛א <S%H7495><s%> unto him And he repaired אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֶהָרֽוּס׃ <S%H2040><s%> [that was] broken down

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took אֵלִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah שְׁתֵּ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten אֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> stones כְּמִסְפַּ֖ר <S%H4557><s%> according to the number שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> of the tribes בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> to whom הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> had come דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> unto whom the word יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> came saying יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> had come שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> shall be thy name

וַיִּבְנֶ֧ה <S%H1129><s%> he built אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הָאֲבָנִ֛ים <S%H68><s%> And with the stones מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and he made תְּעָלָ֗ה <S%H8585><s%> a trench כְּבֵית֙ <S%H1004><s%> as great as would contain סָאתַ֣יִם <S%H5429><s%> two measures זֶ֔רַע <S%H2233><s%> of seed סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> about לַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> the altar

וַֽיַּעֲרֹ֖ךְ <S%H6186><s%> in order אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעֵצִ֑ים <S%H6086><s%> the wood וַיְנַתַּח֙ <S%H5408><s%> and cut אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> the bullock וַיָּ֖שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> in pieces and laid עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָעֵצִֽים׃ <S%H6086><s%> [him] on the wood

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מִלְא֨וּ <S%H4390><s%> Fill אַרְבָּעָ֤ה <S%H702><s%> four כַדִּים֙ <S%H3537><s%> pitchers מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> water וְיִֽצְק֥וּ <S%H3332><s%> and pour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on הָעֵצִ֑ים <S%H6086><s%> the wood וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said שְׁנוּ֙ <S%H8138><s%> Do [it] the second time וַיִּשְׁנ֔וּ <S%H8138><s%> And they did [it] the second time וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שַׁלֵּ֖שׁוּ <S%H8027><s%> Do [it] the third time וַיְשַׁלֵּֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H8027><s%> And they did [it] the third time

וַיֵּלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> flowed הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> And the water סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> the altar וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתְּעָלָ֖ה <S%H8585><s%> the trench מִלֵּא־ <S%H4390><s%> and he filled מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> also with water

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> And it came to pass at [the time of] the offering הַמִּנְחָ֗ה <S%H4503><s%> of the [evening] sacrifice וַיִּגַּ֞שׁ <S%H5066><s%> came near אֵלִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H452><s%> that Elijah הַנָּבִיא֮ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> and said יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> God אַבְרָהָם֙ <S%H85><s%> of Abraham יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> and of Israel הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day יִוָּדַ֗ע <S%H3045><s%> let it be known כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֧ה <S%H859><s%> you אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> that thou [art] God בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> and [that] I [am] thy servant [וּבְדִבְרֵיךָ כ] (וּבִדְבָרְךָ֣ <S%H1697><s%> things ק) עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> and [that] I have done אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> all these things at thy word הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

עֲנֵ֤נִי <S%H6030><s%> Hear יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD עֲנֵ֔נִי <S%H6030><s%> hear וְיֵֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> may know הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> me that this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you O יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that thou [art] the LORD הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God וְאַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> and You הֲסִבֹּ֥תָ <S%H5437><s%> back אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבָּ֖ם <S%H3820><s%> their heart אֲחֹרַנִּֽית׃ <S%H322><s%> again

וַתִּפֹּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> fell אֵשׁ־ <S%H784><s%> Then the fire יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַתֹּ֤אכַל <S%H398><s%> and consumed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> the burnt sacrifice וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣עֵצִ֔ים <S%H6086><s%> and the wood וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> and the stones וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶעָפָ֑ר <S%H6083><s%> and the dust וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> the water אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that was בַּתְּעָלָ֖ה <S%H8585><s%> that [was] in the trench לִחֵֽכָה׃ <S%H3897><s%> and licked up

וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> saw כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> And when all the people וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> [it] they fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> on their faces וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and they said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> he [is] the God יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> He הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> he [is] the God

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said אֵלִיָּ֨הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah לָהֶ֜ם תִּפְשׂ֣וּ ׀ <S%H8610><s%> unto them Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְבִיאֵ֣י <S%H5030><s%> the prophets הַבַּ֗עַל <S%H1168><s%> of Baal אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> let not one אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יִמָּלֵ֥ט <S%H4422><s%> of them escape מֵהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> they וַֽיִּתְפְּשׂ֑וּם <S%H8610><s%> And they took וַיּוֹרִדֵ֤ם <S%H3381><s%> brought them down אֵלִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H452><s%> them and Elijah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> to the brook קִישׁ֔וֹן <S%H7028><s%> Kishon וַיִּשְׁחָטֵ֖ם <S%H7819><s%> and slew שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah לְאַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> unto Ahab עֲלֵ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> Get thee up אֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> eat וּשְׁתֵ֑ה <S%H8354><s%> and drink כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> there ק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> for [there is] a sound הֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> of abundance הַגָּֽשֶׁם׃ <S%H1653><s%> of rain

וַיַּעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> went up אַחְאָ֖ב <S%H256><s%> So Ahab לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> to eat וְלִשְׁתּ֑וֹת <S%H8354><s%> and to drink וְאֵ֨לִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah עָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> went up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רֹ֤אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> to the top הַכַּרְמֶל֙ <S%H3760><s%> of Carmel וַיִּגְהַ֣ר <S%H1457><s%> and he cast himself down אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> upon the earth וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and put פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> his face בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between [בְּרָכֹו כ] (בִּרְכָּֽיו׃ <S%H1290><s%> knee ק)

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to his נַעֲר֗וֹ <S%H5288><s%> to his servant עֲלֵֽה־ <S%H5927><s%> Go up נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now הַבֵּ֣ט <S%H5027><s%> now look דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> toward יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> And he went up וַיַּבֵּ֔ט <S%H5027><s%> and looked וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> There מְא֑וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> [There is] nothing וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said שֻׁ֖ב <S%H7725><s%> Go again שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִֽים׃ <S%H6471><s%> times

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּשְּׁבִעִ֔ית <S%H7637><s%> And it came to pass at the seventh time וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> that he said הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold עָ֛ב <S%H5645><s%> cloud קְטַנָּ֥ה <S%H6996><s%> a little כְּכַף־ <S%H3709><s%> hand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> like a man's עֹלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> Behold there ariseth מִיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> out of the sea וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said עֲלֵ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> Go up אֱמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> unto Ahab אֱסֹ֣ר <S%H631><s%> Prepare וָרֵ֔ד <S%H3381><s%> [thy chariot] and get thee down וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> does not יַעַצָרְכָ֖ה <S%H6113><s%> stop הַגָּֽשֶׁם׃ <S%H1653><s%> that the rain

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> And it came to pass in the mean while וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against כֹּ֗ה <S%H3541><s%> such וְהַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> that the heaven הִֽתְקַדְּרוּ֙ <S%H6937><s%> was black עָבִ֣ים <S%H5645><s%> with clouds וְר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and wind וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become גֶּ֣שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> rain גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and there was a great וַיִּרְכַּ֥ב <S%H7392><s%> rode אַחְאָ֖ב <S%H256><s%> And Ahab וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went יִזְרְעֶֽאלָה׃ <S%H3157><s%> to Jezreel

וְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> And the hand יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> was on אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H452><s%> was on Elijah וַיְשַׁנֵּ֖ס <S%H8151><s%> and he girded up מָתְנָ֑יו <S%H4975><s%> his loins וַיָּ֙רָץ֙ <S%H7323><s%> and ran לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> Ahab עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בֹּאֲכָ֖ה <S%H935><s%> to the entrance יִזְרְעֶֽאלָה׃ <S%H3157><s%> of Jezreel
